name: Relefant
slogan: Interconnecting workplace data and making it super-accessible and actionable
description:
We’re focused on helping organizations become more productive and make better decisions by interconnecting their workplace data and making it all super-accessible and actionable anywhere by their employees. 

The Relefant platform aggregates, interconnects and organizes data using graph technologies, which is easily and intuitively accessible via our visual application. 

Customers are small to large companies that have multiple applications and data sources. The larger a company is, the number of poorly integrated systems and applications increases, along with complexity, information fragmentation and inefficiency costs.

jobs.title: Hands-on marketing specialist and content creator.
jobs.description:
We're looking for a true self-starter, a driven, smart and fun person to join our team as a marketing specialist and content creator for our workplace information/ knowledge solution. You will be part of the core-team, building all aspects of marketing; content, strategies and plans, and you will an integral part of communications with our prospects and customers. We give you freedom to do what you want. 

However, if you can’t create content by yourself, e.g. write a post or article, create and edit images, presentations, infographs and other marketing materials, then this position is not for you.

If you are able to do the things mentioned above and you can plan and strategize marketing, and do some digital marketing as well, then we are very happy to hear from you.

Please write a short message to tell us why you would want to work and be part of a startup like ours.

Requirements:
- Minimum 3 years marketing preferably in B2B, software, SaaS or at an IT solutions provider.
- Excellent skills in English (absolutely no exceptions) and fluency in at least one main language, e.g. German, French, Spanish, etc. 
- Strong story-telling ability to explain concepts in "human terms".
- Ability to produce and edit content.
- You need to have passion, the right attitude, a great personality and be a real self-starter.
- Don’t just tell us you will do something, show us you can.

We offer:
- For the right person, we offer equity in Relefant and salary.
- An international working environment.
- Are you ready for a challenge? Creating with a new data/information/knowledge solution and marketing it to potential customers is not easy.
- As we are developing a global solution, we believe that we can offer you plenty opportunities to grow, learn, and advance in your career and life! 
- This is a great time to join our growing company as an early team member (we’ll tell you more!).

We are 100% remote and were remote before it was cool to be remote. However, we do prefer if you are located somewhere Europe or Canada. We are opening a few offices in strategic locations eventually and you may work there if you want.
